name: Raid of the Tower
description:
A simple 3d endless jumper inspired by popular flash games like Icy Tower, expanded and built upon on. Each floor tells its own visual story about the rise and fall of the Tower, a mysterious building that suddenly appeared on the outskirts of the Kingdom, and which draws the brave adventurers from all over the known world.

To progress in the game, you will have to reach higher floors and collect lost treasures and ancient artifacts you will find in the Tower. You can spend those in the shop, which can sell you more artifacts to make you more powerful and capable of reaching higher.
